pullRequest.title: Add Talisman of the Caveman
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
I added a new talisman. This talisman has a 40% chance to give you haste for 40 seconds.
Heavily based on the Talisman of the Traveller. This idea also came from the #approved section in Discord.
Changes

Add new SlimefunItem with name TALISMAN_HASTIER / hastier_talisman unlocked with 20 levels
Add entry in messages_en and researches_en
Add EventListener for the BreakBlockEvent in TalismanListener.java

Checklist



 I have fully tested the proposed changes and promise that they will not break everything into chaos.
 I have also tested the proposed changes in combination with various popular addons and can confirm my changes do not break them.
 I followed the existing code standards and didn't mess up the formatting.


These are not viable in this case, or so I believe  

 I did my best to add documentation to any public classes or methods I added.
 I have added Nonnull and Nullable annotations to my methods to indicate their behaviour for null values
 I added sufficient Unit Tests to cover my code.

commit.message: Add message entry for hastier talisman
Add event listener to BreakBlockEvent for Hastier talisman

nodes.bodyText: These messages should have a '.' in the end of the sentence.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -151,6 +151,7 @@ messages:
     knight: '&a&oYour Talisman gave you 5 Seconds of Regeneration'
     whirlwind: '&a&oYour Talisman reflected the Projectile'
     wizard: '&a&oYour Talisman has given you a better Fortune Level but maybe also lowered some other Enchantment Levels'
+    hastier: '&a&oYour Talisman gave you haste'

nodes.bodyText: For redundancy but foremost also for performance reasons, there should probably be a check first whether the Player already has a Haste effect running.

For performance/balancing reasons: Maybe only when an ore is mined and not for every block?
But then increase the chance to perhaps 45%?

commit.message: Narrow talisman down to only ores

nodes.bodyText: You forgot to update the lore for the new chance

commit.message:
Add empty line in lore

Co-authored-by: poma123 <25465545+poma123@users.noreply.github.com>
